snippet: The productivity of the Yankees' Mark Teixeira has declined in recent seasons, with his batting average on balls in play decreasing sharply.
abstract: The productivity of the Yankees' Mark Teixeira has declined in recent seasons, with his batting average on balls in play decreasing sharply.

headline.main: Keeping Score: Frustrated by the Shift, Teixeira Thinks Bunt
